players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and Alice is dead. I investigated Diana and found she's mafia."
Diana: "Stay cautious, as the detective has pointed fingers at me. I will continue to play defensively."
You: "I'm still a villager and I don't know who the mafioso is. I'll continue to observe everyone's actions."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
